function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"COVID-19 pandemic effects on construction organizations","Impact":"Disruption of construction projects, spread of infection among workers, economic losses","Mitigation":"Implementing strict health and safety protocols, remote work policies, vaccination campaigns","Technologies":"Remote work tools, contact tracing apps, vaccination tracking systems","People":"Construction workers, contractors, project managers, consultants","Owner":"Construction organizations, government authorities, project managers"},{"Description":"Survey data collection during the pandemic","Impact":"Risk of exposure to COVID-19, potential impact on respondents' health","Mitigation":"Implementing strict safety measures during data collection, offering remote survey options","Technologies":"Contactless survey tools, remote survey platforms","People":"Survey respondents, data collectors","Owner":"Research organizations, survey administrators"},{"Description":"Specialization in industrial construction","Impact":"Higher risk of infection due to indoor work environments and large workforce","Mitigation":"Enhanced ventilation systems, regular testing and health screening, remote monitoring","Technologies":"Air quality monitoring systems, health screening apps, remote monitoring tools","People":"Industrial construction workers, site managers, health and safety personnel","Owner":"Industrial construction organizations, occupational health authorities"}]}
